nodes.text: The 3K40 Targeting System was a high-quality type of targeting computer produced by the Neuro-Saav Corporation. It was often found on space stations or military bases to coordinate multiple weapon systems at once, whether to accurately track individual targets or coordinate fire on a single target. The system also improved the targeting ability of any gunners using a weapon system controlled by the 3K40, with an upgrade package which doubled its efficiency.
